newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sony unit ships more than 10 mln game machines.
newsitem.headline: Sony unit ships more than 10 mln game machines.

text.p: Sony Entertainment Inc, a subsidiary of Sony Corp, said on Monday that worldwide shipments of its 32-bit game console PlayStation exceeded 10 million units by the end of November.
The company launched the game machine in December 1994.

Of the total, domestic shipments of PlayStation reached 4.2 million units, while shipments to the United States and to Europe totalled 3.45 million and 2.35 million respectively, the company said in a statement.
The company said last month that it also plans to start selling PlayStation in Asian markets outside of Japan from early December.
